<style>
.section-team {
  margin: 40px auto;
  max-width: 1200px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* Title với gradient + shine */
.section-team .team-title {
  font-size: 26px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #fff;
  background: linear-gradient(270deg, #313d5d, #4a5d9d, #6a7fc9);
  background-size: 600% 600%;
  animation: gradientMove 12s ease infinite;
  padding: 14px 30px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  margin: 40px auto 30px;
  display: block;
  max-width: 80%;
  text-align: center;
  box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: animation-duration 0.3s ease;
}
.section-team .team-title:hover {
  animation-duration: 3s; /* hover: gradient chạy nhanh hơn */
}
.section-team .team-title::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 50%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(
    120deg,
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) 0%,
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6) 50%,
    rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) 100%
  );
  transform: skewX(-20deg);
  animation: shineMove 6s infinite;
}
@keyframes gradientMove {
  0%   { background-position: 0% 50%; }
  50%  { background-position: 100% 50%; }
  100% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
}
@keyframes shineMove {
  0%   { left: -100%; }
  50%  { left: 100%; }
  100% { left: 100%; }
}

/* Team grid */
.section-team .team-grid {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 100px;
  margin: 20px 0 50px;
}

/* Member card */
.section-team .member-card {
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: scale(0.85);
  transition: all 0.8s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.section-team .experts .member-card {
  transform: translateX(-40px) scale(0.85);
}
.section-team .experts .member-card.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateX(0) scale(1);
}
.section-team .staff .member-card {
  transform: translateX(40px) scale(0.85);
}
.section-team .staff .member-card.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateX(0) scale(1);
}
.section-team .team-grid .member-card:nth-child(1) { transition-delay: 0.2s; }
.section-team .team-grid .member-card:nth-child(2) { transition-delay: 0.4s; }
.section-team .team-grid .member-card:nth-child(3) { transition-delay: 0.6s; }

/* Ảnh + text */
.section-team .member-card img {
  width: 220px;
  height: 220px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: none;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}
.section-team .member-card h3 {
  margin: 15px 0 5px;
  font-size: 1.2em;
  color: #313d5d;
}
.section-team .member-card .role {
  font-size: 1em;
  color: #555;
}

/* Hover */
.section-team .member-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-12px) scale(1.08);
}
.section-team .member-card:hover img {
  animation: pulse 0.8s ease 2;
  box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(49, 61, 93, 0.5);
}
@keyframes pulse {
  0%   { transform: scale(1); }
  50%  { transform: scale(1.05); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); }
}
.section-team .member-card.active img {
  box-shadow: 0 0 25px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.7);
  transform: scale(1.05);
}
</style>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll(".section-team .member-card");

  const observer = new IntersectionObserver(entries => {
    entries.forEach(entry => {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        entry.target.classList.add("visible");
      } else {
        entry.target.classList.remove("visible");
      }
    });
  }, { threshold: 0.2 });

  cards.forEach(card => observer.observe(card));

  cards.forEach(card => {
    card.addEventListener("click", function (e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      cards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove("active"));
      this.classList.add("active");
      setTimeout(() => {
        window.location.href = this.getAttribute("href");
      }, 300);
    });
  });

});
</script>
